meanings.definition: Soldiers specifically trained for ground combat.
meanings.sent1: The infantrymen marched bravely into battle.
meanings.sent2: The infantrymen advanced through the forest quietly.
meanings.sent3: The infantrymen joked about having to fight in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The infantrymen were the frontline warriors in the war.
meanings.sent5: The image of the infantrymen charging forward stayed with me.

meanings.sent3: The infantrymen raced each other during training exercises.
